entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
